name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta with creamy egg sauce and pancetta.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crisp.
Beat eggs and mix with grated parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta, reserving some pasta water.
Combine pasta with pancetta and remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg-cheese mixture, adding pasta water to make creamy sauce.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

name: Sushi
description: Vinegared rice with fresh fish and vegetables, wrapped in seaweed.
steps: Cook sushi rice and season with rice vinegar.
Place nori sheet on bamboo mat.
Spread rice evenly over nori, leaving the top edge free.
Lay slices of salmon and cucumber on rice.
Roll tightly using the bamboo mat.
Slice the roll into bite-sized pieces.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

name: Tacos al Pastor
description: Marinated pork tacos served with pineapple and cilantro.
steps: Marinate pork with chili, pineapple juice, and spices for several hours.
Grill or roast the pork until cooked and slightly charred.
Warm corn tortillas.
Chop pork into small pieces.
Assemble tacos with pork, diced pineapple, onions, and cilantro.
Serve with lime wedges.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Creamy tomato-based curry with marinated chicken.
steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices.
Cook chicken until lightly browned.
Prepare tomato sauce with butter, garlic, and garam masala.
Add chicken to sauce and simmer until cooked through.
Stir in cream and cook for a few more minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

name: Beef Bourguignon
description: Slow-cooked beef stew with red wine and vegetables.
steps: Brown beef cubes in a pan.
Saut√© onions, carrots, and mushrooms.
Add beef back to pot with red wine and beef broth.
Simmer slowly for several hours until beef is tender.
Season with herbs and serve with potatoes or bread.

name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, peanuts, and tamarind sauce.
steps: Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft.
Stir-fry shrimp until cooked.
Add noodles and tamarind sauce, stir-fry quickly.
Add bean sprouts and crushed peanuts.
Mix well and serve with lime wedges.

name: Peking Duck
description: Crispy roasted duck served with pancakes and hoisin sauce.
steps: Prepare duck by drying skin and glazing with maltose syrup.
Roast duck until skin is crispy.
Slice duck thinly.
Serve with warm pancakes, cucumber, spring onions, and hoisin sauce.
Assemble pancakes with duck and condiments.

name: Chili Con Carne
description: Spicy stew with ground beef, beans, and chili peppers.
steps: Brown ground beef with onions.
Add tomatoes, kidney beans, and chili powder.
Simmer for at least an hour to develop flavor.
Adjust seasoning and serve with rice or bread.

name: Pierogi
description: Dumplings filled with potatoes, cheese, or meat.
steps: Prepare dough and roll thin.
Make filling with mashed potatoes and cheese.
Cut dough into circles and fill with potato mixture.
Fold and seal edges.
Boil pierogi until they float.
Serve with fried onions and butter.

name: Falafel Wrap
description: Deep-fried chickpea balls served in pita bread with tahini sauce.
steps: Soak chickpeas overnight and grind with garlic, parsley, and spices.
Form mixture into balls and deep-fry until crispy.
Warm pita bread.
Assemble wrap with falafel, tahini sauce, and fresh vegetables.
Serve immediately.
